name: Yog-Sothoth's Yard
storyline:
In this land where dragons, elves, and humans coexist, you inherit an abandoned mansion and are in debt to the darkness. You need to recruit staffs, including Death, Dragon, Spirit Hunter, and Bioroid Maid, to provide hotel services for different races, and you can also quickly gather funds through Slaughter and Dream. Furthermore, staffs are all objects that can be conquered. The choice of different staffs to conquer and the degree of Darken of one's means of amassing wealth affect the hotel management Endings.
That's right, this game currently has 11 planned Endings, and will continue to increase as the script continues to deepen and the system design continues to increase...
summary: In this land where dragons, elves, and humans coexist, you inherit an abandoned mansion. You need to recruit staffs, including Death, Dragon, Spirit Hunter, Bioroid Maid, to provide hotel services , you can also gather funds through Slaughter and Dream. Staffs are all objects that can be conquered.
